(Original) I visited Monkey Park with my husband and 3 year old son. We really enjoyed it; it was great value for money at ‚Ç¨20 for both adults and under 5s are free. We bought animal food also which was only ‚Ç¨3 as you can feed some of the monkeys, birds, reptiles and guinea pigs.  They have some enclosures you can walk through and feed, as above, and others to view like a normal zoo. Large enclosures so animals have lots of space inside and information is in English and Spanish.  Only downside is there's no restaurant/cafe, its just the animals, so be prepared and take food/drink with you.

topComments.author: Danielle Scott
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Experi√™ncia absolutamente incr√≠vel poder segurar papagaios e alimentar l√™mures, algo que voc√™ n√£o pode fazer no Reino Unido. N√£o apenas macacos tamb√©m p√°ssaros, cobaias (centenas) tartarugas gigantes e iguanas. Todos os recintos eram bem conservados e grandes, com itens de enriquecimento. And for the price it is definitely worth planning to do! The kids loved the variety of animals and monkeys many they have never seen such as baboons. Not just monkeys also birds, guinea pigs (hundreds) giant tortoises and iguanas. All enclosures were well kept and large with enrichment items in. Definitely buy a couple of pots of food to take round with you.

topComments.author: Anders Hejlsvig
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Um parque pequeno, mas agrad√°vel, com uma variedade de macacos diferentes que eu nem sabia que existiam. Also, there is a lot of different birds, guinea pigs and a Cuban crocodile. It is possible to feed some of the animals too. Overall a nice and cheap experience for 2-3 hours. Looks like the animals are treated well.

topComments.author: Hata Hata
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Pre√ßo justo. N√£o √© um zool√≥gico muito grande, mas um lugar bastante divertido para ir.  Como voc√™ pode ver nas fotos, os animais s√£o bem tratados neste zool√≥gico. Eles n√£o t√™m medo de que as pessoas se aproximem deles.  Todo o zool√≥gico √© bastante limpo, os funcion√°rios trabalham muito bem em manter a limpeza. Nenhum cheiro estranho.  O estacionamento fica em frente √† entrada e √© gratuito.  Muito adequado para a fam√≠lia para visitar l√°.  (Original) Fair price. It‚Äôs not a very big zoo but quite a fun place to go.  As you can see from the pictures, animals are well-treated in this zoo. They are not afraid of people getting closer to them.  The entire zoo is quite clean, staffs work quite well on keeping the cleanliness. No strange smell at all.  Parking is just in front of the entrance and it‚Äôs free of charge.  Very suitable for family to visit there.

topComments.author: Remek Rytlewski

Eu recomendo  (Original) A small but interesting park with monkeys and although this is an understatement because there are probably so many more guinea pigs, it is a nice alternative to other attractions of this type.  There are not many monkeys and the park itself is not too many, but it is really worth seeing.  Young children who will have close contact with guinea pigs, monkeys and birds will be especially pleased.  Not which can be fed with special food purchased locally.  I recommend

topComments.author: Mal Bel
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Melhor atra√ß√£o de Tenerife para meus filhos de 7 e 9 anos. (E fomos ao parque Siam - eles ainda preferiam o zool√≥gico de macacos). Eles adoraram tanto que fomos duas vezes - taxa de entrada muito acess√≠vel a ‚Ç¨ 30 para 2 crian√ßas e 2 adultos. Oportunidade de segurar papagaios e tirar fotos por 8‚Ç¨. Voc√™ pode alimentar macacos, mas por volta das 12 horas eles n√£o estavam t√£o interessados ‚Äã‚Äãem comer, talvez chegar mais cedo seria melhor. Oportunidade incr√≠vel de estar t√£o perto de tantos animais diferentes. Qualquer amante dos animais ir√° apreciar este pequeno local. O cen√°rio era t√£o limpo, arrumado. Parque de estacionamento gratuito no exterior.  (Original) Best Tenerife attraction for my children 7 and 9. ( And we went to the Siam park-they still preferred the monkey zoo).They loved it so much we went twice- entrance fee very affordable at ‚Ç¨30 for 2 kids and 2 adults.  Opportunity to hold Parrots and have pic taken for ‚Ç¨8. You can feed monkeys but at around 12 they weren't so interested in eating, maybe coming earlier would be better. Amazing opportunity to be so close to so many different animals. Any animal lover   will appreciate this little place. The setting was so clean, tidy. Free car park outside.

topComments.author: Rachael Harrison
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Muito limpo e arrumado. Os animais s√£o claramente bem cuidados. Don't expect fancy caf√© or big gift shop.  It's nice and small, low-key, excellent value for money.

topComments.author: Holger v.d. Linde
topComments.comment: We had an awesome experience here with beautiful animals and great people working here. Wonderful lady from Peru at ticket office, great guy from Argentina taking care of the animals. We had monkeys and parrots sitting on our shoulders, we hand -fed several animals. Parrots were repeating what were saying. We had a marvelous time here!
